basics.name: Samar D Acharya
basics.label: Software & Cloud Architect
basics.summary: Born in Nepal and currently living in Kansas City, USA, Samar is a self-motivated, challenge seeker, problem solver, avid hacker, reliable and passionate individual with sharp learning curve and dedication to building highly available and reliable applications and systems.

work.summary: PayLease provides property management services and solutions such as payment, billing and smarthome systems
highlights: Work with various teams for architectural foundations of systems built
Work with various teams for Cloud Native initiatives
Manage cloud platform of Zego

work.summary: PayLease provides property management services and solutions such as payment, billing and smarthome systems

highlights: Managed and maintained infrastructure and application

work.summary: Brightergy, LLC was a clean energy company with a vision to utilize technology to be able to collect vast amount of energy data and turn them into actionable intelligence. Leveraging the power of IoT, the technology team is utilizing range of platforms, programming languages, databases and cloud to build such energy platform.
highlights: Write backend api and device code in elixir and python
Lead a team of engineers to build successful cloud and device solutions
Manage cloud platform of BrighterLink, the enrgy platform including scaling, high availability, security and resilience at all level
Design the solutions and implementation details for various features

highlights: Led a team of volunteers to deploy electronic library using LTSP and provided training to the students
Developed a complete solution to automate the deployment of electronic library
